name: Anker Prime MagSafe Car Mount Charger, Qi2 25W Certified Wireless Car Charger with TEC Cooling, Strong Magnets, Air Vent Mount for iPhone 17-12 Series (Check Vent Compatibility, Includes 60W Adapter)
short_description: 25W Ultra‑Fast Wireless Charging: Charge your iPhone 17 Pro to 50% in just 22 minutes—exceeding the limits of standard 25W wireless charging with TEC active cooling. Enjoy wired-level speed with the convenience of wireless, up to 6× faster than 5W wireless. While charging and in use, stays cool and stable—up to 4× faster than 5W wireless. Actual performance may vary.

Aerospace-Grade TEC Active Cooling: With TEC active cooling, your phone stays below 89°F while charging, providing a safer and more efficient experience. Lower temperatures help protect your battery and reduce long-term wear. Actual performance may vary.
Adjust to the Perfect Angle: Switch between portrait and landscape modes with ease, and fine-tune your viewing angle with ±32° tilt. No more blocked views—just smooth, distraction‑free navigation.

Stays Put on Any Road: Combines an ultra-strong 13N magnetic force and a locking vent hook to keep your phone stable through bumps and turns. Tested on eight rough road conditions, your phone stays securely mounted without falling.

What You Get: Anker Prime Wireless Car Charger (MagGo, AirCool, Pad), Anker Car Adapter (60W, 2 Ports), 3.3 ft USB-C to USB-C Cable, cord organizer, 2 cable holders, welcome guide, 24-month warranty, and our friendly customer service.

Compatibility: Not compatible with Tesla or Mercedes-Benz vehicles, or with cars that lack vent blades or use nonstandard vent designs, such as round air vents. Refer to the compatibility image to confirm if your car vent is supported. Compatible vent blade depths must be between 10 mm and 24 mm for optimal charging performance.
Installation Tips: The mount is non-detachable and only supports tail-hook installation.

Overheat-Proof Charging Pad: This car charging pad is built with safety and performance in mind. Its innovative design separates the charging coil from the circuit board to reduce heat buildup—delivering safer, more efficient wireless charging every time, even during long drives

Shockproof & Anti-Slip Design: This wireless charger car is crafted from durable PVC and built to last. Washable and water-resistant, it offers long-lasting performance and protection

Note for Wireless Charging Pad Use & After-Sales Support: 1.Car USB or Type-C ports may not provide sufficient power for wireless charging. The port power requirement is 5V/2A, 9V/2A. For optimal performance, please use a 20W PD adapter (not included). 2. Cases with metal, magnets, MagSafe, credit cards, stands, or pop sockets may block wireless charging or cause overheating.
